title: Excellent driving skill and nice manner
name: Panat P
description: I have a fantastic trip with Mr.Bharat Swami. He is very nice driver with skillful driving. “You safe, me safe & my bus safe are my policy🥰”. The bus was clean everyday, even how busy we have made for him😅. All of seat cover was cleaned everyday, no bad smell, no dust. Moreover, he has an excellent skill for taking photos. Thinking about private transfer, think of Mr.Bharat Swami❤️

title: Very good service 👍👍👍👍👍❤️
name: Sherpa07111838399
description: very good service, easy to contact and very quick respond.“Mr.Honey”, is the best chauffeur. He is very nice guy, safe drive and punctual. The car is great, very good Air Con and very comfortable.They are trustful and would make your trip easier and more enjoy!

title: First time in India
name: Kitiya Y
description: Very nice driver, good service and good advice. feel very safe.

title: Great Service
name: Macca T
description: They provide very good service, easy to contact and very quick respond. Sharma ji, or he likes us to call him “Mr.Honey”, is the best chauffeur. He is very nice guy, safe drive and punctual. The car is great, very good Air Con and very comfortable. They are trustful and would make your trip easier and more enjoy!

title: Happy trip with Mr.Bharat 👏🏻🤍
name: Jeans C
description: Mr.Bharat is our kind driver. His service impressed us very much. He took us to fun, beautiful places and we were happy. He drives safe, comfortable and doesn't worry about his driving at all.Thank you for taking us on a happy trip.

title: Nice Bharat
name: Ingnapitch L
description: Bharat is my chauffeur he is nice, calm and polite he take us to the place that good for tourist not for shop that need commissions i was enjoy this trip so much 💕💕💕💕

title: The best around!
name: Sherpa24142057212
description: Mr T is a dream! He is so kind and knowledgeable about India! He goes the extra mile each day to make your trip Special And memorable. He knows allOf the fun things to do and see and buy -unfortunately! He cleans his brand new car every day and always has snacks and waters. He even had his wife make us lunch one day - delicious! We love Mr T and highly recommend him!!!

title: Best Experience ever
name: Resort13814948894
description: Super duper best Guide in India. Friendly, Funny, Super cool!! Recommended!!! Best experience ever you got 100 stars from us

title: Nice Indian Local Car and Driver
name: Mobile14511304349
description: Hitesh driver service you like family , he is very polite and give me recommend many thing. I and my buddy are very impressing him. He is very excellence service mind ❤️

title: Recommend!!!
name: Sureerat S
description: 3 days in Jaipur - very exciting places, goods taste of foods, discovering new things, bought many of handicrafts (ran out of money already (0.o).. But totally, thank you Honey for the experience.    very very happy with u.

title: Quality of Clothing!
name: Georgina S.
description: I love this shop! The products are high-quality, the customer service is excellent

title: Customer Service!
name: Elizabeth A.
description: The products are always top-quality, and the staff is incredibly friendly and helpful
